name: Star/OpenOffice SSP-Extensions
short_description: The aim of this project is to provide exportfilters and extensions that enable the popular Star/OpenOffice Suite to be used as a single source publishing application. Initial target formats are PDF and HTML customized for Print, Web and Presentations.
